newsitem.title: USA: Labor Ready July same-store sales up 51 pct.
newsitem.headline: Labor Ready July same-store sales up 51 pct.

text.p: Labor Ready Inc Thursday reported same store sales for the four weeks ended July 25, 1997 rose 51 percent from the year ago level.
Total sales in July 1997 were $26.6 million, an increase of 116 percent from $12.4 million one year ago.

"New stores opened this year continue to generate significantly higher average sales than stores opened last year. We are optimistic this trend will continue for the balance of the year," Glenn Welstad, president, said in a statement. Labor Ready provide temporary workers to the light industrial, construction and small business markets.
